MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KY8 postcode area of Leven, affecting properties in Coldstream Crescent and surrounding streets  Our team has managed to restore power to a number of properties in the area and are still working to repair an underground cable fault affecting the rest of our customers without power. We now expect all power to be back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:05am Wednesday, 20 January 2021.
